channel.title: Mod thread of Awesome Flipless FM
channel.description:
Hey if we need to communicate with each other please put stuff here or you can reach me at Discord.
Will be randing and sending out PMs later today.
@Insanity when you get the chance please post the formatting for the vote counts so @midonik16 has it.
Rock on people!

item.description:
I’m pretty sure they don’t care about what I said in the class card. That interaction was irrelevant to the game being played, I just stated my opinion that your “newbie flipless” isn’t even newbie. It’s a normal flipless with forum veterans with 3 newbies added in to make it look like a newbie game. I was going to say it has been a pleasure working with you, but you’re honestly delusional lmao

item.source: Mod thread of Awesome Flipless FM

item.title: Mod thread of Awesome Flipless FM
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
To answer your question is that if a scum is demoralized and a mod posting a random meme or gif gives them hope or encourages them then you’ve altered their mental state. A mental state that is the only thing town has to go off of. The literal only thing for reads is interactions. Posting in active players PTs has to be done to a bare minimum. Ideally the only thing we post are vote counts.

Read full topic
